about_the_game:
Greg Nicolett’s sweeping score to Potionomics is as magical as Rafta itself, with each character’s theme evoking their own rich, unique story. Featuring live orchestra and a diverse array of soloists, this soundtrack will make you wish you’d inherited your own potion shop.

This deluxe edition of the soundtrack features eight bonus tracks not available on music streaming platforms!
